name: flagship-app
description: Become a renowned vexillologist by honing your flag-based skills with Flagship.

scripts.prebuild: rimraf public && mkdir public && mkdir public/js && mkdir public/css
scripts.build: pulp browserify --optimise > public/js/flagship.js && npm run html && npm run sass
scripts.postbuild: ncp src/images public/images && ncp src/server public/server
scripts.start: npm run build && echo "Started server on port 5000..." && babel-node public/server/default.js

author: Adam Timberlake <adam.timberlake@gmail.com>
